name: Caesium perchlorate
desc: Caesium perchlorate, CsClO4 (also known as cesium perchlorate), is a perchlorate of caesium. It forms white crystals, which are sparingly soluble in cold water and ethanol. It dissolves more easily in hot water.
Lattice constant: a = 982 pm, b = 600 pm, c = 779 pm (orthorhombic, <219 °C)
Other cations:
Lithium perchlorate
Sodium perchlorate
Potassium perchlorate
Rubidium perchlorate
